item.title: Backup and Restore with NetApp
item.description: Astra Control Center - December Release 2021 Today NetApp released the new release of Astra Control Center. ACC provides the ability to backup and restore kubernetes applications. Besides the classic bugfixing there are now a few new features: âœ… In-place restore âœ… Execution hook âœ… Support for additional Kubernetes distributions I have summarized how the first two features work in a video. The video is available in German for now.

item.title: Backup and Restore with NetApp
item.description: Astra Control Service View month ago, NetApp announced Astra Control Service as their application aware backup tool for cloud provider native kubernetes cluster. In my video I show you how the backup and restore will work on GCP or Azure. This video is in German! Enjoy listening ðŸ˜‰
